subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: At one point, the road rose so sharply to meet Simon Gerrans’s bike that he began to look over his shoulder, searching for riders ascending much more quickly. But there was no one.
snippet: At one point, the road rose so sharply to meet Simon Gerrans’s bike that he began to look over his shoulder, searching for riders ascending much more quickly. But there was no one.
